divs: sighting detailsi was driving home, and when i look up at the sky and there was 3 glowing orange orbs that appeared to be in a triangle and when i blinked they were in a straight line. they were way to close together to be airplanes abd i have never seen a plane have such a blindingly bright light. i couldve stared at them forever, except i wouldve crashed my car in the process. i have never been so scared\curious in my life. i am not a star gazer. in fact i am completely skeptical on the whole e.t. thing, but i know what i saw.
Summary: most frightened i have ever been
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 2 other sightings in New York on or around April 30th 2013
